resources.string: "Night Mode protects your eyes from strong lights when using your phone in the night.\nSome devices\' lowest brightness are still high and that can harm your eyes.
Enable this can make mask on the top of screen, but it may needs a permission in some devices (Such as MIUI and Android 6.0)\nIf it couldn\'t work, please allow this app to show system alert window.
Failed to start mask. Please check if system has denied the permissions.
Can you see this message? If you can, it proves that Night Mode is working well. \nIt will automatically stop after 5 seconds if you didn\t press OK.
